import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-quizz', templateUrl: './quizz.component.html', styleUrls: ['./quizz.component.css'] }) export class QuizzComponent implements OnInit { title:string = "" questions:any questionSelected:any answers:string[] = [] answerSelected:string = "" questionIndex:number = 0 questionMaxIndex:number = 0 finish:boolean = false constructor(){} ngOnInit(): void { } }
